content.text: I'll create the User domain files for the book-leaderboard Spring Boot backend. Let me start by writing all four files.
Now let me create the UserRepository file.
Now let me create the UserService file.
Now let me create the UserController file.

Perfect! I have successfully created all four User domain files for the book-leaderboard Spring Boot backend.

**Created files:**

1. `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/src/main/kotlin/com/bookreads/user/User.kt` - JPA entity
2. `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/src/main/kotlin/com/bookreads/user/UserRepository.kt` - Spring Data repository
3. `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/src/main/kotlin/com/bookreads/user/UserService.kt` - Business logic service
4. `/Users/se/git/cc-experiments/backend/src/main/kotlin/com/bookreads/user/UserController.kt` - REST controller

All files have been written exactly as specified with no additional comments.
